How to Sell your Gift Cards
    Please ensure that your browser is updated
  1. Go to the Sell card page.
  2. Select your card Category, then the Card Denomination.
  3. Upload your Cards, we accept at most 10 cards at once.
  4. Enter your correct bank Account Details.
  5. Enter a valid email, we would contact you via this email.
  6. Click the Sell it Button
